module.name: lcsvutils
module.short: Contains routines used to read and process Comma-separated values from a file or a stream
module.descr: lcsvutils.pas contains routines used to read and process Comma-separated values from a file or a stream. It is used in the implementation of the LazUtils package and the TGrid component.

element.name: TCSVRecordProc
element.short: Procedure used to read and process comma-separated values
element.descr: TCSVProc is a nested procedure used when reading and processing comma-separated values. A TCSVProc reference is passed as an argument to the LoadFromCSVFile and LoadFromCSVStream routines. Applications must create a procedure that performs actions required when a line of CSV of data has been read from its data source and separated into individual field values.

element.name: TCSVRecordProc.Fields
element.short: TStringList used to store comma-separated field values

element.name: TCSVEncoding
element.short: Represents character encodings used for values in CSV data
element.descr: TCSVEncoding is an enumerated type which represents character encodings that can be used for CSV data.

element.name: TCSVEncoding.ceAuto
element.short: Auto-detects character encoding applied to the CSV data

element.name: TCSVEncoding.ceUTF8
element.short: CSV data uses the UTF-8 encoding

element.name: TCSVEncoding.ceUTF16
element.short: CSV data uses the UTF-16 encoding

element.name: TCSVEncoding.ceUTF16be
element.short: CSV data uses the UTF-16 Big-Endian encoding

element.name: LoadFromCSVStream
element.short: Loads and processes comma-separated values from the specified stream

element.name: LoadFromCSVStream.AStream
element.short: TStream instance containing the CSV data

element.name: LoadFromCSVStream.AProc
element.short: Routine used to load and process records in the CSV data

element.name: LoadFromCSVStream.ADelimiter
element.short: Delimiter used to separate fields in the CSV data

element.name: LoadFromCSVStream.CSVEncoding
element.short: Character encoding used for the CSV data

element.name: LoadFromCSVFile
element.short: Loads and process comma-separated valued from the specified file

element.name: LoadFromCSVFile.aFilename
element.short: File name which contains the CSV data

element.name: LoadFromCSVFile.AProc
element.short: Routine used to load and process records in the CSV data

element.name: LoadFromCSVFile.ADelimiter
element.short: Delimiter used to separate fields in the CSV data

element.name: LoadFromCSVFile.CSVEncoding
element.short: Character encoding used for the CSV data
